Name: Sergeant Whiskerbyte
Description: Hailing from the digital frontlines of the WebtrES club, Sergeant Whiskerbyte is a battle-hardened soldier with a twist. With a screen showcasing the classic cat smile, this pixel warrior brings a unique mix of fierceness and playfulness to the battlefield. Despite his tough exterior and soldier's arms and legs, Whiskerbyte has a soft spot for his feline companions, symbolized by his cat-themed buttons. He's often seen strategizing his next move or leading his troop of virtual comrades into the next skirmish with a blend of tactical prowess and nine lives’ worth of courage.
